title: name
description: An internationalized name with one or more localized names.

nl.description: A human-readable name in the `nl` (Dutch) language.

fr.description: A human-readable name in the `fr` (French) language.

de.description: A human-readable name in the `de` (German) language.

en.description: A human-readable name in the `en` (English) language.
